refnamediv.refpurpose: Deinterleaves arrays by picking alternate data from its input.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Takes an input array and deinterleaves its data by choosing the data from alternate positions.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kout1[], kout2[] -- output arrays containing the deinterleaved output. They will be created if not existent.
kin[] -- input array containing the values to be deinterleaved.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para: Here is an example of the deinterleave opcode. It uses the file deinterleave.csd.

example.title: Example of the deinterleave opcode.
example.para: See the sections Real-time Audio and Command Line Flags for more information on using command line flags.
